review: so i got my chromecast dongle, plugged it in, downloaded the app to my laptop, easy! i watched some youtube videos.but then when i wanted to go back to cable-- my television no longer worked. nothing happened when i pressed menu on my cable box, nothing happened when i pressed the input button on my remote to change back to cable. basically, now i have no television service, no cable service; nothing works anymore. my screen simply says no signal.plugging in this item messed up everything!!!i called google support and was told to call my cable company. of course, this had to happen on a saturday-- i'm not going to have any television until next week when the cable company comes to fix this. and i doubt google will pay for that service call.everything worked fine until i plugged the [expletive] dongle in. and now it doesn't.i'm returning this product.
